query: best dog friendly hotels in New York
title: What are the best dog-friendly hotels in New York
excerpt: Finding dog-friendly hotels in New York can be a daunting task, as many establishments impose restrictions or lack proper amenities for our furry companions. This list is valuable because it highlights welcoming hotels that cater to both pets and their owners, ensuring a comfortable stay for everyone. With these recommendations, travelers can enjoy the vibrant city without worrying about leaving their pets behind or compromising on quality.
intro: Discover the best dog-friendly hotels in New York, where both you and your pup can enjoy a memorable stay in the city that never sleeps.

hotels.name: The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York
hotels.description: Experience the pinnacle of luxury at The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, located directly across from Central Park. This elegant hotel features exceptional white glove service, along with exquisite dining at Perrine, where modern American cuisine delights the palate, and Two E, a bar/lounge perfect for afternoon tea and live jazz. Families will also appreciate the thoughtful amenities for young guests, plus easy access to attractions like the Central Park Zoo and Museum Mile, making it an ideal retreat for all.
hotels.highlight: Offers pet-friendly amenities including pet bowls and a basket for your dog.

hotels.name: Four Seasons Hotel New York Downtown
hotels.description: Four Seasons Hotel New York Downtown offers a luxurious escape with elegantly designed rooms featuring modern amenities, plush bathrobes, and complimentary toiletries. Guests can unwind at the serene lap pool and spa, stay fit in the state-of-the-art gym, or savor exquisite cuisine at Cut by Wolfgang Puck. Nestled in the vibrant heart of Downtown Manhattan, the hotel provides easy access to iconic landmarks like the Brooklyn Bridge and SoHo, making it an ideal choice for both relaxation and exploration.
hotels.highlight: Offers pet-friendly accommodations alongside luxurious amenities, including a spa, private check-in/out, and proximity to iconic landmarks.

hotels.name: The Gotham Hotel
hotels.description: Discover luxurious boutique accommodation in Midtown Manhattan at The Gotham, where elegant rooms feature loft-like ceilings, large windows, and opulent bathrooms adorned with Italian glass mosaic tiles. Savor gourmet dining at the hotel's acclaimed restaurant and enjoy complimentary WiFi, turn-down service, and access to a nearby gym. Ideally located between Madison and 5th Avenues, you can easily explore iconic attractions like Rockefeller Centre and Times Square, and unwind on one of our five scenic balconies.
hotels.highlight: The Gotham Hotel offers pet-friendly accommodations, gourmet dining, and private check-in/out for a luxurious stay in Midtown Manhattan.

hotels.name: The Historic Blue Moon Hotel - NYC
hotels.description: Experience the perfect blend of historic charm and modern comfort at The Historic Blue Moon Hotel in NYC, established in 1879. Each of the 22 uniquely decorated guestrooms features kitchen amenities and plush bedding, ensuring a cozy retreat. Enjoy delectable Italian cuisine at Sweet Dreams Cafe and take advantage of convenient amenities like a business center, all while being ideally situated near iconic attractions such as New York University and One World Trade Center.
hotels.highlight: Offers dog-friendly accommodations with kitchen amenities and access to an art gallery and snack bar.

hotels.name: Hotel Indigo Lower East Side New York, an IHG Hotel
hotels.description: Experience a vibrant artistic atmosphere at Hotel Indigo Lower East Side New York, featuring rotating art installations that enhance your stay. Enjoy complimentary WiFi for seamless connectivity while indulging in exquisite dining at Mr. Purple or relaxing by the open-air heated pool. Embrace the perfect blend of creativity, comfort, and luxury in this unique New York hotel.
hotels.highlight: Offers pet-friendly accommodations with a rooftop garden and an open-air heated pool for a unique urban retreat.

hotels.name: Pod 51
hotels.description: Discover the vibrant Pod 51 hotel, ideally located near Rockefeller Center in Manhattan. With a multilingual concierge to help plan your adventures, guests can enjoy complimentary daily activities and guided tours. On-site dining includes a cozy cafe for breakfast and Clinton Hall for delicious American fare, while modern room amenities feature MP3 docking stations, free WiFi, and a safety deposit box, ensuring a comfortable stay.
hotels.highlight: Pod 51 offers pet-friendly accommodations, on-site dining, and a terrace for guests to enjoy during their stay.
